content.rendered:
Photo by Minimography

This Week in Genesis a free theme, a new StudioPress third party theme, plus news on AMP support for Genesis.

Let’s get to it!

Themes

Themedy Team launches Brisket (and it’s free for a limited time).

For a limited time grab our latest theme Brisket for FREE! https://t.co/xNGt7Remy4 #genesiswp #thesiswp

— Themedy Team (@themedythemes) February 22, 2016

Glam Pro by Restored 316 Designs is now available on StudioPress as third party theme.

Now available, Glam Pro by @restored316 — https://t.co/b9Btsj0S4R #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/xpA0R9W6H0

— StudioPress (@studiopress) February 24, 2016

Wes Straham maintains his impressive work rate with a theme tease of Follow Me.

The "Follow Me 2.0" theme is almost ready – https://t.co/K8qNinyY9A#genesiswp #WordPress

— Wes Straham (@WesStraham) February 25, 2016

Theme tease from Rainbow Fire Media with Cayman

Finishing off our #genesiswp theme – Cayman for bloggers. Exciting times! https://t.co/8DLbckRkMM pic.twitter.com/o1uZxvU2lL

— Rainbow Fire Media (@rainbow_media) February 21, 2016

Ren V teases a new theme.

Building a new child theme for all you #GenesisWP fans! Slick design, front-end CSS editor, & more. #WordPress pic.twitter.com/f5V3SA9gmM

— Ren V. (@CLE_Ren) February 22, 2016

Showcase

Showcase favourite Emily White launches maneuveringthemiddle.com

Making middle school math look cool! @hbgreg and I are pleased to launch a brand new #genesiswp site for https://t.co/t52uD4G6An.

— Emily White (@emwhitedesigns) February 19, 2016

…plus another site release, this time for acesealcoat.com

Custom #genesiswp site for my brother's company: https://t.co/BoYhUU2v2W. Great dev from @hbgreg, especially w/ the tank volume calculator.

— Emily White (@emwhitedesigns) February 24, 2016

Shaan Nicol with a new site for theminutelist.com

I’ve just set this one live today, it’s taken a while and not responsive yet – https://t.co/eGJcggUVeA #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/dXcJebPjwW

— ChillyBin Web Design (@chillybindesign) February 26, 2016

Always love Ryan Townley’s work and this one is no different with an impressive site for saintst.com

Just launched this single page #genesiswp site I developed for my marketing agency partner, Saint Street… https://t.co/Ku9qzQZGnP

— Ryan Townley (@ryantownley) February 25, 2016

Kathy Osborne for dianperry.com

Just launched! https://t.co/5FbyNUyNXj Thanks,@Voicegirl1111! @studiopress #genesiswp #wp #webdesign pic.twitter.com/6XYnq2OuJf

— Kathy Osborne (@koartdesign) February 24, 2016

Sheelah B launches alqomarketing.com based on the Kickstart Pro theme.

Had fun launching a brand new site for @AlqoMarketing this week. Such fun! #genesiswp #webmarketing pic.twitter.com/l4jImFEyAk

— sheelah_b (@sheelah_b) February 19, 2016

Brad West launches a new site for iglu.net

https://t.co/obJOl0saWz, my latest custom WordPress theme build with #GenesisWP.

— Brad West (@bradonomics) February 20, 2016

Tara Claeys with a joomla to WordPress conversion for valgrubbandassociates.com

Just launched another new site. This one converted from an old joomla site with lots of content. https://t.co/ye4myJ3e0D #genesiswp

— Tara Claeys (@design_tlc) February 20, 2016

Libby Lane redesigned libbylanepress.com using Lindsey Riel’s Pretty theme.

And a new Genesis and WooCommerce site from AlphaBlossom for sydandmeas.com.

Best of the rest

Brian Gardner hints at incorporating AMP support for Genesis, probably by way of a plugin. (AMP what? Get the details here).

@saracup @studiopress We are looking into it, and more than likely if we do, it'll come by way of a #genesiswp plugin.

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) February 23, 2016

Juan Rangel with some Genesis Quick Tips

New series Genesis Quick Tips! #genesiswp Follow along. https://t.co/zhvHUyROt7

— Juan Rangel (@WPZombies) February 19, 2016

Sridhar Katakam with stacks of tutorials on:

  • Default fallback for featured images on CPT archive and single pages in Genesis,
  • How to replace sticky message widget with a navigation menu in Modern Studio Pro,
  • Utility Bar in Centric Pro, and
  • Displaying a fixed number of posts in WordPress without Pagination.

How to replace sticky message widget with a navigation menu in Modern Studio Pro: https://t.co/eTeSY1riB4https://t.co/cBuTi9wjKu

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) February 22, 2016

Jackie D’Elia keeps firing up tutorials for Utility Pro. Her latest, adding a SVG Logo to Utility Pro Theme.

Keeping it sharp – Adding a SVG Logo to Utility Pro theme. #GenesisWP #Sass #WordPress https://t.co/WzbRBiG9Qj pic.twitter.com/I4NkiaXwmS

— Jackie D'Elia (@SavvyJackie) February 22, 2016

Slackable has a tutorial on adding a scroll to top button and how to add custom ID attribute to theme using genesis_attr_entry.

Scroll to Top Button in #WordPress Footer – without any #JavaScript – #Genesiswp Tipshttps://t.co/FBkTKb3iyZ #CSS pic.twitter.com/TMxMevVzv1

— Slackable (@Slackable) February 23, 2016

Simple Pro Themes with a tutorial on Displaying a different mobile logo on Sunshine Pro

Displaying a different mobile logo is easy in Sunshine Pro #genesiswp theme – https://t.co/KbIUsqV74Q #wordpress

— Simple Pro Themes (@SimpleProThemes) February 23, 2016

And finally…

We’ve all been there. Don’t work too hard, people 🙂

Why won't these link colors change??? Oh…. right… "foot-widgets" is not a proper class. #longday

— Ryan Townley (@ryantownley) February 26, 2016

That’s all for this week.

If I missed your cool thing though please give it a shout out in the comments below.

And make sure to tune in next week when Tony Eppright of AlphaBlossom will be taking the controls.

PS Like these updates? If you don’t already, I’d love it if you subscribed. Just enter your email in the box below.
